name: @geoman-io/maplibre-geoman-free
description: A MapLibre Plugin For Drawing and Editing Geometry Layers

scripts.build: rimraf dist && vite build --config vite.config.ts && npm run build:types
scripts.build:types: tsc -p tsconfig.types.json --emitDeclarationOnly && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.types.json && rollup -c rollup.config.dts.js && node ../../scripts/verify-variant-types.mjs maplibre dist/maplibre-geoman.d.ts && rimraf dist/types
